product_name: Wilderness Press 101 Hikes In Southern California: Exploring Mountain Seashore and Desert - 3rd Edition
long_description: 101 Hikes in Southern California offers an incredible array of reasons to leave the hustle and bustle of urban landscapes behind and discover the natural beauty of the area.
short_description: 101 Hikes in Southern California offers an incredible array of reasons to leave the hustle and bustle of urban landscapes behind and discover the natural beauty of the area.
